```{r table_summary}
# TODO: add road lengths
trp_for_vti_aadt |> 
  dplyr::group_by(county_geono, county_name, road_category) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    n_trp = n(),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(county_geono) %>%
  dplyr::left_join(
    measured_traffic_work,
    by = c("county_geono", "road_category")
  ) |> 
  dplyr::select(-county_geono) %>%
  #tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = road_category, values_from = c(n_trp, measured_percentage_of_traffic_work)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(
    Fylke = county_name,
    #Fylkesveg = 'F',
    #Riksveg = R
    Vegkategori = road_category,
    Antall_TRP = n_trp,
    Prosent_trafikkarbeid = measured_percentage_of_traffic_work
  ) %>%
  DT::datatable(
    rownames = FALSE,
    filter = "none",
    options = list(
      dom = "t",
      pageLength = 25,
      autoWidth = TRUE))
```



```{r map, message=FALSE, fig.height=9}
palett_adt <-
 leaflet::colorNumeric(
   palette = "Greens",
   domain = NULL
  )

link_color_keep <-
  leaflet::colorFactor(
    palette = c("#ed1c2e", "#0000ff"),
    domain = c(TRUE, FALSE),
    levels = c(TRUE, FALSE)
  )

# TODO: county polygons (nice to have)

trp_for_vti_aadt_R <- 
  trp_for_vti_aadt %>% 
  dplyr::filter(road_category == "R")

trp_for_vti_aadt_F <- 
  trp_for_vti_aadt %>% 
  dplyr::filter(road_category == "F")

trp_id_in_county <- 
  trp_for_vti_aadt |> 
  dplyr::filter(
    county_geono %in% c(3)
  )

links_in_county <-
  link_candidates |> 
  dplyr::filter(
    trp_id %in% trp_id_in_county$trp_id
  )

trp_for_vti_aadt %>% 
  leaflet(
    width = "100%",
    options = leafletOptions(
      crs = nvdb_crs,
      zoomControl = TRUE
    )
  ) %>%
  addTiles(
    urlTemplate = nvdb_map_url,
    attribution = nvdb_map_attribution
  ) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = trp_for_vti_aadt_R,
    group = "R",
    radius = 6,
    stroke = T,
    weight = 2,
    color = "#58b02c",
    opacity = 0.8,
    fill = T,
    fillColor = ~palett_adt(adt),
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    label = ~trp_label
  ) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    data = trp_for_vti_aadt_F,
    group = "F",
    radius = 6,
    stroke = T,
    weight = 2,
    color = "#008ec2",
    opacity = 0.8,
    fill = T,
    fillColor = ~palett_adt(adt),
    fillOpacity = 0.8,
    label = ~trp_label
  ) %>%
  addPolylines(
    data = links_in_county,
    opacity = 0.8,
    #fill = T,
    color = ~link_color_keep(to_keep),
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
      bringToFront = TRUE,
      sendToBack = FALSE,
      color = "#000000",
      opacity = 0.6
      )
    ) %>%
  addLegend(
    "bottomright",
    pal = palett_adt,
    values = ~adt,
    title = "Ã…DT",
    opacity = 0.7,
    labFormat = labelFormat(big.mark = " ")
  ) %>% 
  addLegend(
    "bottomright",
    pal = link_color_keep,
    values = ~links_in_county$to_keep,
    title = "I fjor",
    opacity = 0.7
  ) %>% 
  addLayersControl(
    overlayGroups = c("F", "R"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE)
  )
```
